subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jaroslav Halak made 21 saves for his sixth shutout of the season and the Islanders earned a 3-0 win over the Buffalo Sabres at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Jaroslav Halak made 21 saves for his sixth shutout of the season and the Islanders earned a 3-0 win over the Buffalo Sabres at Nassau Coliseum.
